text: Hello! Welcome to NetBank Support. How can I help you today?
Hi! I have a question about my recent transactions.
Of course! Could you please provide your account number?
Thank you. I see your account. Are you looking for a specific transaction or your full history?
I noticed a payment to 'GreenTech Services' yesterday. Can you tell me more about it?
Certainly! The payment to 'GreenTech Services' was for $120.00 on July 3, 2025. Would you like to see more details or dispute this transaction?
No dispute, just checking. Also, can I set up an alert for payments over $100?
Yes, you can set up custom alerts in your account settings. Your friend Alice recently set up a travel notification using her account ID 20250206, so you can do something similar for payment alerts.
Great, I'll do that. Thanks for your help!
You're welcome! If you need anything else, just let us know. Have a wonderful day! ğŸ˜Š
